Question: Medicine Shop is $900$ metres from Library. Playground is $400$ metres from Library. Assuming Medicine Shop and Playground are in the same direction from Library which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Library is nearer to Playground than Medicine Shop
Wrong_Answer_1: Medicine Shop is at same distance from Library and Playground
Wrong_Answer_2: Medicine Shop is nearer to Playground than Library
Wrong_Answer_3: Playground is at same distance from Library and Medicine Shop
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Library and Medicine Shop be $x$, and the distance between Library and Playground be $y$.
Here $x=$$900$$m$ and $y=$$400$$m$.
Library---$400$$m$--->Playground
Library-----$900$$m$----->Medicine Shop
Distance between Medicine Shop and Playground $= $$900$$-$$400$$ = $$500$$m$    ...([distance between Library & Medicine Shop] $-$ [distance between Library & Playground])
Library----$400$$m$---->Playground----$500$$m$---->Medicine Shop
As we can see that the distance between Library and Playground is $400$$m$, and the distance between Medicine Shop and Playground is $500$$m$.
Since the distance between Library and Playground $<$ distance between Medicine Shop and Playground
Library is nearer to Playground than Medicine Shop

Question: Bus Stop is $450$ metres from Petrol Pump. Theatre is $300$ metres from Petrol Pump. Assuming Bus Stop and Theatre are in the same direction from Petrol Pump which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Bus Stop is nearer to Theatre than Petrol Pump
Wrong_Answer_1: Theatre is at same distance from Petrol Pump and Bus Stop
Wrong_Answer_2: Petrol Pump is nearer to Theatre than Bus Stop
Wrong_Answer_3: Bus Stop is at same distance from Petrol Pump and Theatre
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Petrol Pump and Bus Stop be $x$, and the distance between Petrol Pump and Theatre be $y$.
Here $x=$$450$$m$ and $y=$$300$$m$.
Petrol Pump---$300$$m$--->Theatre
Petrol Pump-----$450$$m$----->Bus Stop
Distance between Bus Stop and Theatre $= $$450$$-$$300$$ = $$150$$m$    ...([distance between Petrol Pump & Bus Stop] $-$ [distance between Petrol Pump & Theatre])
Petrol Pump----$300$$m$---->Theatre----$150$$m$---->Bus Stop
As we can see that the distance between Petrol Pump and Theatre is $300$$m$, and the distance between Bus Stop and Theatre is $150$$m$.
Since the distance between Bus Stop and Theatre $<$ distance between Petrol Pump and Theatre
Bus Stop is nearer to Theatre than Petrol Pump

Question: Petrol Pump is $550$ metres from Police Station. Supermarket is $850$ metres from Police Station. Assuming Petrol Pump and Supermarket are in the same direction from Police Station which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Supermarket is nearer to Petrol Pump than Police Station
Wrong_Answer_1: Petrol Pump is at same distance from Police Station and Supermarket
Wrong_Answer_2: Police Station is nearer to Petrol Pump than Supermarket
Wrong_Answer_3: Supermarket is at same distance from Police Station and Petrol Pump
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Police Station and Petrol Pump be $x$, and the distance between Police Station and Supermarket be $y$.
Here $x=$$550$$m$ and $y=$$850$$m$.
Police Station---$550$$m$--->Petrol Pump
Police Station-----$850$$m$----->Supermarket
Distance between Petrol Pump and Supermarket $= $$850$$-$$550$$ = $$300$$m$    ...([distance between Police Station & Supermarket] $-$ [distance between Police Station & Petrol Pump])
Police Station----$550$$m$---->Petrol Pump----$300$$m$---->Supermarket
As we can see that the distance between Police Station and Petrol Pump is $550$$m$, and the distance between Petrol Pump and Supermarket is $300$$m$.
Since the distance between Petrol Pump and Supermarket $<$ distance between Police Station and Petrol Pump
Supermarket is nearer to Petrol Pump than Police Station

Question: Office is $800$ metres from Playground. Library is $900$ metres from Playground. Assuming Office and Library are in the same direction from Playground which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Library is nearer to Office than Playground
Wrong_Answer_1: Library is at same distance from Playground and Office
Wrong_Answer_2: Office is at same distance from Playground and Library
Wrong_Answer_3: Playground is nearer to Office than Library
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Playground and Office be $x$, and the distance between Playground and Library be $y$.
Here $x=$$800$$m$ and $y=$$900$$m$.
Playground---$800$$m$--->Office
Playground-----$900$$m$----->Library
Distance between Office and Library $= $$900$$-$$800$$ = $$100$$m$    ...([distance between Playground & Library] $-$ [distance between Playground & Office])
Playground----$800$$m$---->Office----$100$$m$---->Library
As we can see that the distance between Playground and Office is $800$$m$, and the distance between Office and Library is $100$$m$.
Since the distance between Office and Library $<$ distance between Playground and Office
Library is nearer to Office than Playground
